org.apache.giraph.utils

类 ArrayListWritable<M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractList<E>
        • java.util.ArrayList<M>
          • org.apache.giraph.utils.ArrayListWritable<M>
  • 类型参数:
    M - Message data
    所有已实现的接口:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Iterable<M>, Collection<M>, List<M>, RandomAccess, org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable, org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable

    public abstract class ArrayListWritable<M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends ArrayList<M>
implements org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable, org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable
    A Writable for ListArray containing instances of a class.
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

      构造器和说明

      Constructor with another ArrayListWritable.
      ArrayListWritable(Class<M> refClass)
      This constructor allows setting the refClass during construction.
